CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 17 reads: "6. Dorothy Paul modeled the mink stole which Mrs. Mary Atkinson, 5237 Scheley Ave., is wearing; Sue Warner modeled the marmot mink stole won by Mrs. Mary Hicks, 2208 Snowden. Sam Simon of the American Fur Company awarded the prize furs."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of three men, and three women, including Dorothy Paul in center, modeling fur, standing in American Fur Storage & Cleaners booth in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
